description: This produces an array containing only values from another array that pass a predicate test.

parameters.description: This is a boolean function that is called to determine if an array entry should be included in the returned array.
parameters.name: predicate

parameters.description: These are the values passed to the predicate with the exception that the first array is passed as the single current value from the array. At least one array is required.
parameters.name: values

returns.description: This is the resulting filtered array.
